issue.title: Robot falls while carrying tools in habitat

content.raw: I don't experience these issues at all locally. Though I haven't tried them over the constellation. I can't say much to help ya'll out however because my gait is entirely custom tuned which is much different than that video which was posted. Just my 2 cents. Though it is possible, atleast from my end. Unfortunate that I'm not as ahead as you all are.
